entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-07-20
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Custom commands are not invoked for some controls #16268
  • Hot-Reload Not Detecting XAML Changes #16267
  • How to retrieve cookies in response message of a WebView #16266
  • CommandMapper.Add() causes stack overflow #16263
  • Picker in MacCatalyst doesn't select the SelectedItem #16261
  • Maui 8 preview 6 Visual studio 2022 preview 4 - Cannot build android or iOS blank app (windows host) #16259
  • Tab key doesn't move between Entry fields on Mac Catalyst #16255
  • 'Binding Command' in MenuFlyoutItem works only once #16254
  • Exception of type 'Interop+AndroidCrypto+SslException' was thrown in .NET MAUI 8.0 preview #16253
  • Touchscreen not working after rapidly clicking while app startup #16251
    Backlog
  • BackgroundColor of a Label doesn't work in Release on iOS IMMEDIATE ATTENTION REQUIRED! #16250
  • Home Indicator Auto Hidden Not Working In MAUI #16247
  • Flyout Page: Tap gesture not working on iOS in split mode when setting FlyoutOverlapsDetailsInPopoverMode to false #16246
  • Appium tests do not detect content inside Flyout Detail on iOS #16245
  • MAUI 7.0.92 requires Microsoft.Extensions.Logging.Abstractions 7.0.0 while .NET 7.0.9 7.0.1 #16244

PullRequests

Created

  • [ios] fix memory leak in TimePicker #16265
    memory-leak 💦
  • Fix infinite recursion error in CommandMapper.Add() #16264
    community ✨
  • Improve the names of the test files/runs #16262
  • Add a Mac Catalyst device test run #16260
  • [builds] Add another option to install the cert #16258
    t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • [net8.0] Bump Microsoft.Extensions packages #16257
    area/upstream, dependencies, 8.0-preview7
  • [Android] Fix default Switch Style #16252
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/templates 📄, area/controls 🎮, control-switch

Merged

  • TextTransform set before Text #16248
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/testing
  • Don't use loaded/unloaded on FlyoutPage #16241
    area/FlyoutPage

Updated

  • Internalize RealParent #16269
  • Move most controls to use ModifyMapping (and variants) #15058
    area/controls 🎮
  • Prevent Android timer from adding multiple callbacks #16078
  • [iOS] Add updates for LineHeight, TextDecorations, CharacterSpacing #16223
    platform/iOS 🍎, area/controls 🎮, community ✨, control-label
  • [Windows] fixing window glitches while moving or resizing #14861
    platform/windows 🪟, area/desktop 🖥️, community ✨
  • [Bug] Fix Grid cells not honoring MaxWidth #16215
    area/layout 🔲, layout-grid
  • [net7.0] Set the SafeAreaInset Property with updated value (#15512) #16238
  • [Windows] Fix SwipeView DeviceTests #16226
    platform/windows 🪟, t/housekeeping ♻︎, control-swipeview
  • Use AppendToMapping for Element and VisualElement #14948
    platform/windows 🪟, platform/android 🤖, platform/iOS 🍎, area/controls 🎮, platform/tizen
  • [net8.0] Merge main into net8.0 #16144
    area/infrastructure 🏗️, 8.0-preview7
  • [iOS] Changes in Border clipping part #15856
    t/bug, platform/iOS 🍎, area/controls 🎮, control-border, i/regression
  • Add a UI test for tapping on a label span #16222
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/testing
  • Fix issues with ScrollView on ios that does not correctly resize when… #15460
    area/layout 🔲, community ✨
